text_block_list.text:
Wow♪ The photo is so sharp! 
That's the latest model, right?
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Yep, I managed to snatch one during 
the limited pre-orders!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
That's so cool♪ Keep making super- 
duper cute pics of Curren, 'kay?☆
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Ah, sorry, I got a notification... Oh? 
That overseas brand has opened pre- 
orders for their latest smartphone?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
It's got a special camera and features 
for selfies. Hmm, I wonder what it's like.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
(Hang on. Bad Transcend! You only just 
got a new phone! You couldn't...)
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
What? That sounds cool! 
I wanna see the photos it makes♪
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
I wonder if it can unlock new ways of 
bringing out my charm☆
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Aaand, order..! 
This new one is a must-have, after all!
text_block_list.name: Transcend
